attributes.action: Ban the use of palm oil in all products in this country
attributes.additional_details: If you cut down the trees you're are letting carbon dioxide into the air and the trees can no longer capture carbon dioxide. If you cut them down carbon dioxide goes back into the environment which creates a blanket around the world that keeps the heat in - hence climate change.
attributes.background: why would we use palm oil when we could just use vegetable oil that does the same job without cutting down trees, destroying the planet and contributing to climate change?
